(Fasteddie_felson's advice with my tweeks) I did it and it worked

1) Turn off Internet.
2) Install program. (dont hit "launch" after it downloads. keep that window open)
3) Copy the crack and paste it in the directory where you installed it at. If you didnt change the default setting then it should look something like this.... C:\Program Files\AVS4YOU\AVSVideoConverter6 (thats where mine was automaticaly saved)
So it should be pasted in the AVSVideoConverter6 folder.
4) Delete the UPDATE MANAGER folder (its in the AVS4YOU folder)
5) Click the "Launch" button in the completed instalation window
6) Turn internet back on
